title: Vertical Integration Doesn't Work In Cannabis Sector With Narbe Alexandrian, Canopy Rivers
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Narbe Alexandrian is President and CEO of Canopy Rivers, the publicly traded investment platform for Canopy Growth (note that this was recorded before Bruce Linton's departure). He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss what stage we're currently at in his 5 wave theory of how the cannabis industry will evolve, why ag-tech and Europe are exciting plays right now and what investors are getting when they buy Canopy Rivers. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
